page.title: 06The Abingdon Marathon.
page.content: The marathon started and finished in Abingdon, following a route through the local villages and taking in Culham, Sutton Courtenay and Drayton. It began at 11.00 am and the first man came through Drayton at 1.30 pm. I am in the Army Cadets and we helped by passing wet sponges to the runners. In the morning it was raining but it had stopped by the afternoon. The runners finished going through Drayton at 5 o'clock. This was the third year that the race has been held and two teachers from our school entered - Mr. Bainbridge and Miss Porter who covered twenty six miles in 4 hours and 10 minutes.
